text: Zorko Prelovec was a Slovene composer, well known for his choral works and Lieder. He was also active as a choral conductor, leading the Ljubljana Mercury choir from 1900. It has been said that he was a musical poet and that his compositions for choirs are filled with a soft, tender sentimentality. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1887 births Category:1939 deaths Category:Slovenian composers Category:People from Idrija
title: Zorko Prelovec
